text: Ivanna () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Viktor Ivchenko.Почему папа Римский проклял советский фильмВатикан предал анафеме крупнейшего советского режиссера It stars Inna Burduchenko, Anatoly Motornyi, and Dana Kruk. ==Actors== * Inna Burduchenko as Ivanna * Anatoly Motornyi as Theodosius Stavnycyi * Dana Kruk as Yulya, a friend of Ivanna * Did Panas as Panas Stepanovych Holub * Evgeny Ponomarenko as comrade Taras Sadakly * Vladimir Goncharov as captain Zhurzhenko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Ivanna (movie)
